content:
Today we deployed our FHIR package server reference implementation.
You can create and install packages from Simplifier

You can use our free command line tool to install packages
and all its dependencies.
https://simplifier.net/downloads
or use an NPM client

My blog:
https://simplifier.net/organization/firely/news/55

This is the FHIR package draft spec.
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_NPM_Package_Spec
